item.title: CSCO
item.description: score:-33 Chances: The outlook for CSCO stock depends on trends for cloud computing, corporate, and telecom networks amid the shift to remote work. New corporate products and services could boost Zoom stock but Microsoft looms. The tech sector stalwart enjoyed a record-setting fiscal first quarter.
